answers.answer: Not a biggie - doctors have diagnosed it and will keep a close eye! They have to tell you all the possible outcomes, but because they're monitoring you it should be fine.

question: I have been diagnosed with gestational diabetes and I was told today of the possible "StillBorn" or "Miscarriage" and I am VERY scared. Are there any mothers who can give me advice. 30 weeks and 1 day, baby was 5 pounds 4 oz last Friday, 10/07/16.. Please help!!
title: Diabetes scare
